superheroes.name: Batman
superheroes.description: The Dark Knight of Gotham City, Batman is a billionaire vigilante who uses intellect, martial arts, and advanced technology to fight crime. Founding member of the Justice League.

superheroes.name: Superman
superheroes.description: The last son of Krypton, Superman is Earth's greatest protector. With near-godlike powers, he stands as the ultimate symbol of hope and justice.

superheroes.name: Wonder Woman
superheroes.description: An Amazonian warrior princess and daughter of Zeus, Wonder Woman fights for peace and justice with her unbreakable will and warrior's heart.

superheroes.name: The Flash
superheroes.description: The fastest man alive, Barry Allen uses his super speed to fight crime and protect the multiverse from speed-related anomalies.

superheroes.name: Green Lantern
superheroes.description: A fearless pilot turned intergalactic guardian, Hal Jordan wields the Green Lantern ring to protect the universe from cosmic threats.

superheroes.name: Aquaman
superheroes.description: The King of Atlantis, Aquaman bridges the worlds of land and sea, using his strength and leadership to defend both from threats.

superheroes.name: Cyborg
superheroes.description: A former athlete turned cybernetic warrior, Cyborg is a genius hacker and powerhouse fighter with built-in technology to protect the world.

superheroes.name: Martian Manhunter
superheroes.description: A survivor of Mars, J'onn J'onzz is a telepathic warrior with shape-shifting abilities, sworn to protect Earth as a member of the Justice League.

superheroes.name: Green Arrow
superheroes.description: A billionaire playboy turned vigilante, Green Arrow uses his unmatched archery skills and wit to fight crime and corruption in Star City.

superheroes.name: Shazam
superheroes.description: A boy gifted with the ability to transform into a powerful superhero by saying 'SHAZAM!' He wields the magical power of the gods.

superheroes.name: Hawkman
superheroes.description: A reincarnated Egyptian prince, Hawkman possesses the ability to fly and wields powerful ancient weapons.

superheroes.name: Hawkgirl
superheroes.description: A fierce warrior from Thanagar, Hawkgirl wields an energy mace and uses her formidable combat skills to battle villains.

superheroes.name: Zatanna
superheroes.description: A powerful magician and stage performer, Zatanna uses backwards incantations to perform magic and fight supernatural threats.

superheroes.name: Doctor Fate
superheroes.description: An immortal sorcerer and wielder of the Helmet of Fate, Doctor Fate is one of the most powerful magic users in the DC Universe.

superheroes.name: Blue Beetle
superheroes.description: A teenager bonded with an alien scarab, Blue Beetle has powerful armor with advanced technology and weapons.
